name: Satie Cells
description:
A procedurally generated puzzle game with an interactive soundtrack based on Erik Satie's Gymnopédie n°1

If the computer gets a better score, you can see how he did it~

You can draw your own grids~

TOP SECRET TIP : you can press the "space" key to delete cells instead of clicking the delete button.

TOP SECRET TIP 2 : don't forget to click "hide tutorial" at the bottom left of the screen once you've got the basics down because damn those instructions are scary and intrusive right

I hope you enjoy the game :<

Thanks for reading so many words <3

You can tell me things or see more @Contrebasse
